newsitem.title: FRANCE: Two children killed in school bus crash in France.
newsitem.headline: Two children killed in school bus crash in France.

text.p: Two children were killed and about 10 others injured when a school bus collided with a heavy goods vehicle in the French village of Saint-Pierre-du-Montat in the central Nievre department, local officials said on Tuesday.
"We have two deaths and at least one child who is seriously injured, plus another 10 who have been less seriously wounded," said a local government spokesman.
The bus was carrying 30 children to school on Tuesday morning when the accident occurred. The cause was being investigated.
